beverages.name: Pineapple Juice
beverages.description: Freshly squeezed pineapple juice, rich in vitamin C and enzymes, offering a sweet yet tangy tropical burst that cools and refreshes instantly.

beverages.name: Watermelon Juice
beverages.description: Hydrating and naturally sweet watermelon juice blended with a hint of mint, perfect for beating the summer heat while replenishing lost fluids.

beverages.name: Grapes Juice
beverages.description: Smooth and antioxidant-rich grape juice made from sun-ripened black grapes, delivering a deep, sweet flavor that's both heart-healthy and delicious.

beverages.name: Lime Juice
beverages.description: Refreshing lime juice infused with crushed mint leaves and a pinch of salt, offering a revitalizing, tangy punch and natural detox properties.

beverages.name: Passion Fruit Juice
beverages.description: Vibrant passion fruit juice with its bold aroma, tart taste, and vitamin-rich pulpâ€”crafted to elevate your mood and refresh your senses.

beverages.name: Orange Juice
beverages.description: A glass of classic orange juice with natural pulp, bursting with citrus goodness, immune-boosting vitamin C, and a fresh-from-the-orchard taste.

beverages.name: Apple Juice
beverages.description: Cold-pressed apple juice with no added sugar, retaining its crisp flavor and loaded with antioxidants for a naturally sweet and healthy drink.
